quote: After a couple of kilometers on the road to stretch out the peloton, the first gravel sections arrive... and immediately we already see the first technical problems, mainly flat tires
For some fun, for others too technical: this technical singletrack with lots of roots along the edge of the lake caused tongues to wag. Beautiful it certainly is

The second loop may be shorter, but it is littered with small bumps that hurt the legs! Maximum concentration is required to take this kind of tight corners on a dry surface, before you know it you slide away here and end up on the ground
